title: With Roku 4, 4K Content Grabs the Spotlight
text:
With Roku 4, 4K Content Grabs the Spotlight 
Published By: TomsGuide.com - Today 
The Roku 4 helps videophiles hunt down 4K content across a wide variety of channels and can stream it at up to 60 frames per second....
